comment.description: Add a comment to the rule. Requires UFW version >=0.35.

insert.description: Insert the corresponding rule as rule number NUM

direction.description: Select direction for a rule or default policy command.

route.description: Apply the rule to routed/forwarded packets.

policy.description: Change the default policy for incoming or outgoing traffic.

state.description: C(enabled) reloads firewall and enables firewall on boot. C(disabled) unloads firewall and disables firewall on boot. C(reloaded) reloads firewall. C(reset) disables and resets firewall to installation defaults.

logging.description: Toggles logging. Logged packets use the LOG_KERN syslog facility.

log.description: Log new connections matched to this rule
